nouns: A circular hand sign

description: This version of the  OK Hand emoji has the  Medium-light Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Cream White Skin Tone on supported p
apple_vendor_description: The 'OK' hand gesture, rendered with a medium-light skin tone on Apple devices, presents a perfectly formed circle with the thumb and index finger touching, while the other fingers are gently extended. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading gives this emoji a smooth, polished appearance, with realistic lighting casting subtle shadows that emphasize its rounded form. This hand symbol, seen on Apple devices, conveys a sense of agreement, approval, or well-being, making it a universally understood sign of positivity in digital conversations.
